attributes.additional_details: The laboratory ranges for vitamin B12 defieciency in the Uk are set far too low . By the time people are below what is termed normal range , neurological damage is often present and has been for some time , affecting their health , and ability to work and function normally . I propose that the lowest range for blood serum Vitamin B12 be reset at a higher level of 400 , with levels under 500 being investigated to ensure no deficiency at cellular level.
